message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a unique value that exceeds $1200000 to us due to its innovative features, unparalleled quality, and exclusive craftsmanship. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an introductory price of $1500000. This special offer is valid for a limited time only, and we encourage you to consider this opportunity to own a piece of unparalleled luxury and innovation.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product.
